page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
Lack of space does not permit the inclusion of the names of everyone who took part,but to all those who contributed in any way: Our thanks!
P.2 and 3: HART HILL PRIMARY SCHOOL
P.4,5 and 9: WENLOCK PRIMARY SCHOOL
P.7,8,10 and 14: STOCKWOOD HIGH SCHOOL
P.17 and 18: DALLOW PRIMARY SCHOOL
P.19: HILLBOROUGH PRIMARY SCHOOL
P.1,6,11,12,13,15 and 16:SURREY STREET PRIMARY SCHOOL,who also wish to record the enthusiastic involvement of Mr.W. King,retired shoemaker,of New Town Street,and that of Mr.Vic Lea, historian and journalist,of Cambridge Street,in the making of a video-film.
